tool_description: Compares supplier financial metrics against industry benchmarks and peer companies for relative performance assessment.

supplier_metrics.description: Array of supplier financial metrics to compare

company_size.description: Company size category: SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE, ENTERPRISE

error_messages: Invalid industry code: Provide a valid NAICS industry classification code.
Invalid company size: Use one of [SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE, ENTERPRISE].
Insufficient metrics: Provide at least 3 financial metrics for meaningful comparison.
Benchmark data unavailable: Industry benchmark data not available for specified industry and year.
Invalid benchmark year: Year must be between 2020 and 2024.
Unsupported geographic region: Use supported region codes.
usage: Provide supplier_metrics array, industry_code, and company_size. Optionally specify geographic_region and benchmark_year. Returns comparative analysis against industry benchmarks.

percentile_rankings.description: Percentile rankings for each metric compared to industry

relative_performance.description: Overall relative performance: EXCELLENT, ABOVE_AVERAGE, AVERAGE, BELOW_AVERAGE, POOR

industry_position.description: Position within industry: TOP_QUARTILE, SECOND_QUARTILE, THIRD_QUARTILE, BOTTOM_QUARTILE

key_strengths.description: Areas where supplier outperforms industry average

improvement_areas.description: Areas where supplier underperforms industry average
